gobblin.util.io

Class GsonInterfaceAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.util.io.GsonInterfaceAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The interface or abstract type to be serialized and deserialized with Gson.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<T>, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<T>

    public class GsonInterfaceAdapter<T>
extends Object
implements com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<T>, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<T>
    A Gson interface adapter that makes it possible to serialize and deserialize an object with an interface or abstract field with Gson.

    Suppose a class 

    MyClass
    contains an interface field 
    MyInterface field
    . To serialize and deserialize a 
    MyClass
    object, do the following: 
              
            MyClass object = new MyClass();
            Gson gson = GsonInterfaceAdapter.getGson(MyInterface.class);
            String json = gson.toJson(object);
            Myclass object2 = gson.fromJson(json, MyClass.class);
